artifact.stellar_shard.name: Stellar Shard
artifact.stellar_shard.short: Black-glass metal that reflects starlight underground.
artifact.stellar_shard.discovery: The echo arrives before the pulse finishes. Your HUD rejects the timing, then accepts it anyway.
artifact.stellar_shard.tooltip: Quarantine-Class Object: Resonance return exhibits non-causal phase behavior. Store in the Vault’s null-light compartment.
artifact.ancient_lattice.name: Ancient Lattice
artifact.ancient_lattice.short: A folded grid of metallic filaments, impossibly thin.
artifact.ancient_lattice.discovery: Your detector reports multiple sizes at once. The hush stops sounding like noise and starts sounding like a warning.
artifact.ancient_lattice.tooltip: Quarantine-Class Object: Field-sensitive framework. Vault storage requires a containment cage to prevent unfolding.
artifact.void_compass.name: Void Compass
artifact.void_compass.short: A ringed mechanism that orients to a direction your maps cannot name.
artifact.void_compass.discovery: It settles with certainty. The compass arrow in your HUD feels suddenly… embarrassed.
artifact.void_compass.tooltip: Quarantine-Class Object: Orientation anchor unknown. Registry mandates immediate Vault intake. Do not attempt calibration.
artifact.quantum_fossil.name: Quantum Fossil
artifact.quantum_fossil.short: Stone that holds motion—patterns shifting when you look away.
artifact.quantum_fossil.discovery: The deposit reads like geology until Tier 5 resolves the coherence inside it. The ground is not merely old; it is edited.
artifact.quantum_fossil.tooltip: Quarantine-Class Object: Phase-unstable internal structure. Vault stores in thermal stabilizer to reduce drift.
artifact.machine_relic.name: Machine Relic
artifact.machine_relic.short: A scorched actuator core with joints that twitch under scan.
artifact.machine_relic.discovery: Your extractor vibrates against something that should not respond. It does. Slowly. Like it’s waking up.
artifact.machine_relic.tooltip: Quarantine-Class Object: Reactivity risk. Vault seal required to prevent unauthorized activation.
artifact.echo_prism.name: Echo Prism
artifact.echo_prism.short: A crystalline prism that refracts sound and light into shapes.
artifact.echo_prism.discovery: The scan returns twice—once for where it is, once for where it wants to be. The hush goes quiet, as if listening.
artifact.echo_prism.tooltip: Quarantine-Class Object: Signal-active medium. Vault stores in shielded node to prevent echo bleed into Registry bands.

lore.tip.scan_tradeoff: Every scan buys knowledge. It also buys attention.
lore.tip.claim_fast: If you want it, claim it. The Registry favors whoever signs first.
lore.tip.depleted_markers: Depleted sites are not mistakes. They’re proof.
lore.tip.badlands: In the Badlands, the hush stops acting like interference and starts acting like intent.
lore.toast.night_1: Night falls. Your lamp bubble feels smaller than it should.
lore.toast.night_2: The hush thickens in the dark. Your map remembers what you earn.
lore.toast.day_1: Morning light. Same ground. New echoes.
lore.toast.day_2: Day cycle resets. Rival crews don’t sleep—only their machines do.

lore.registry.flavor_2: Registry Notice: quarantine-class salvage must be deposited immediately.
